name: Lain
content: Qubit! Wake up already. Grandpa left you three chores to finish before sunset!

name: Qubit
content: Chores? Ughhh… can’t they wait? I was having such a good dream...

name: Lain
content: Nope! He said they’re important. And he told a few people around town some clues to help you out. But first—you need to get moving. Use the arrow keys ↑, ↓, ←, and → to walk around the farmland. Try walking in all four directions!

requirement.description: Walk in all four directions using arrow keys

name: Qubit
content: Alright, alright… walking around… Got it. Maybe this won’t be so bad.

name: Lain
content: Good! Now, before you start on the chores, Grandpa said you’d need to use his coding terminal to help automate your tasks. Click on the 'Code Editor' button to open it.

name: Lain
content: Perfect! This terminal is your tool for getting chores done faster. You can write commands to handle farming tasks automatically.

name: Lain
content: Let’s start simple. In the main code window, type exactly this: plant("wheat"). That’s how you plant wheat seeds when you’re standing on farmland.

requirement.description: Type plant("wheat") in the code editor

name: Qubit
content: Okay, I typed it in. Now what—do I just hope it grows?

name: Lain
content: Not quite! Click the play button (▶) to execute your code and watch yourself plant those seeds!

requirement.description: Click the play button to execute code

name: Lain
content: Nice work! Grandpa’s first chore involves planting crops, so this’ll come in handy. But you’ll need to move around, too. Try typing one of these next: move_left(), move_right(), move_up(), or move_down()

requirement.description: Type any movement command in the code editor

name: Qubit
content: Oh wow, I can make myself move with code! Grandpa really left some cool tools behind.

name: Lain
content: Exactly! Click the play button again to execute your movement command and see yourself move automatically.

requirement.description: Click the play button to execute movement command

name: Lain
content: Great job! You’ve got the hang of it—moving around, planting crops, and coding actions. Now you can use these skills to finish Grandpa’s three chores. Talk to the townsfolk to find out what each one is!

name: Qubit
content: Got it! Move around, code smart, and get those chores done. Guess I better start asking around town!
